attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel the government should suspend all stamp duty for the next 18 months to free up the housing market, £175k is a start but much more needs to be done...
With the current squeeze on we need all we can to help the housing market and people who can hardely get a mortgage let alone pay stamp duty!!!

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters.
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
